<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158557</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158557</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3111</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading Cards -No 11: Orphaned</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesekarten - Nr. 11: Verwaist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de Lecture - Non 11 : Perdu ses 
parents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartões Da Leitura - No. 11: Orphaned</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schedi Della Lettura - No 11: Orphaned</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάρτες ανάγνωσης - αριθ. 11: Orphaned</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarjetas De la Lectura - No 11: Dejado 
huérfano</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a writing assignment where the students read a passage and are required to write there own ending to the passage</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Schreiben Anweisung, in der die 
Kursteilnehmer einen Durchgang lesen und wird benoetigt, um dort zu 
schreiben besitzen Ende zum Durchgang</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une affectation d'écriture où les 
étudiants lisent un passage et est exigée pour écrire là 
possèdent la fin au passage</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atribuição da escrita onde os 
estudantes leiam uma passagem e é requerida para escrever lá possui 
o ending à passagem</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'assegnazione di scrittura dove gli 
allievi leggono un passaggio ed è richiesta per scrivere là possiede
la conclusione al passaggio</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια ανάθεση γραψίματος όπου οι σπουδαστές
διαβάζουν μια μετάβαση και απαιτούνται για να γράψουν εκεί 
δικούς που τελειώνουν στη μετάβαση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una asignación de la escritura donde los
estudiantes leen un paso y se requiere para escribir allí posee el 
conclusión al paso</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
